column5: will be there june 10 - 17 any one going to be there that time???will be staying at tall pines staying at best western in dryden any good bait stores in dryden to get minnos and leeches any tips on the lake would be great.... we will have a guide on sunday ( steve owner)thanks for your time wayne
No need to buy them on the way up. Steve will have plenty at the camp. Yes, they will cost a bit more but you won't have to buy 10 dozena ta time and have many of them die on you. Just my opinion.

I would agree with buying them at the camp. More than likely you'll be loosing money when they die on you during transport. However if you must I believe you can buy them at local gas stations in Vermillion bay which is on your way.
K&A sports and tackle right on the main drag in Dryden if your going to buy them in town. Abes...
